edu.harvard.integer.service.event

Interface EventManagerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseManagerInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventManagerLocalInterface, EventManagerRemoteInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventManager

    public interface EventManagerInterface
extends BaseManagerInterface
    The event manager is used to get/save/update the events created by the services in Integer or external devices sending alerts to the Integer serv.er
